meanings.definition: A substance found in cartilage that is commonly used as a dietary supplement for joint health.
meanings.sent1: I take chondroitin to help my joints stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Many people use chondroitin to support their joint function.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that chondroitin is like a superhero for our joints.
meanings.sent4: Chondroitin is the secret weapon that keeps our cartilage strong.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of chondroitin for joint health are truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A type of glycosaminoglycan that helps maintain the structure and function of cartilage in the body.
meanings.sent1: The body relies on chondroitin to keep cartilage in good shape.
meanings.sent2: Chondroitin plays a crucial role in supporting cartilage function.
meanings.sent3: I imagined chondroitin as the architect of our cartilage buildings.
meanings.sent4: In the body's construction site, chondroitin is the foreman of cartilage.
meanings.sent5: The presence of chondroitin ensures the durability of our cartilage structures.
